item.description:
Hi everyone, a member of our group suggested this event, he is the DJ for the event.
I recently met Les at the church picknick and i was surpriszed at the amount of people there..
I would have chased a few around the place..but it was a church..would have looked like a wedding or cold feet event if i did that LOL..
Ok im on the rafting trip in Vermnt that day so there is no way we will get back in time..
I hear the dance is inside but didnt get much more than that..most likely its good..
ask Les what his thught are..



What djleswho wrote:
----------------------------------------------------------------
Christian Music Singles Dance at First Church of Christ - 250
Main street, Wethersfield, CT

Saturday Sept 22nd, 2007

7-11pm There be a mix of Rocking, swinging, upbeat, praising
Christian music and some selected secular music.

Opened to adult aged singles, $10.00 per person, includes
pizza and light refreshments. Come for the dancing, music,
praising and fellowship.

For more information please feel free to send me an email.
djleswho@mac.com

ust the specific address above..
its right in the center of the historick part of town..take a right at the flagg pole and a right into the driveway of the large church...

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Dance in Wethersfield
